src package¶

Submodules¶

src.specplot module¶

specplot.py

The file with functions to style the spectral plots.

src.specplot.get_band_vals(snp)¶
src.specplot.get_marks(mn: numpy.ndarray, mx: numpy.ndarray, n: int = 10)¶

src.specroutines module¶

specroutines.py

The file with functions to connect and manipulate SpecMod objects for use with Dash.

src.specroutines.get_event_spectra(pdir: str, ev: str) → SpecMod.specmod.Spectral.Spectra¶

Loads in the spectra for a given local specmod event spectra group for a given event (datetime string).

Args:

pdir (str): The parent directory of the specmod spectra pickle file ev (str): The event datetime (e.g., “2012-10-08T12:12:12.760000Z”)

Returns:

tr (specmod.Spectra): A SpecMod spectral instance

src.utils module¶

A module that contains utility functions for specmod-dash.

src.utils.any_none(*args)¶
src.utils.is_auto_bandwidth(fig, pos)¶
src.utils.trace_in_fig(fig: plotly.graph_objs._figure.Figure, name: str) → bool¶

Looks for the trace with a given name and returns True if it exists or False if it does not.

Args:

fig (plotly.graph_ojects.Figure): A figure object to be checked. name (str): The name of the trace to look for.

Returns:

tr (bool): True if the trace is in figure, False otherwise.
